text: @ImranKhanPTI Khan saab.Kindly apni govt.Transparent rakhy..Ap achy hai pr apki govt ma kam krne ki ability kam dikae dy rahi hai.Still no way to control COVID-19 as day by day cases increases to its high peak.Poor handling by https://t.co/twZS2XxxW4 there is no proper health facilities
